mapper.insert: insert into customer (cust_id, cust_name, password, cust_phone, address, header_pic) values (#{custId}, #{custName}, #{password},#{custPhone}, #{address}, #{headerPic})
mapper.update: update customer set cust_name = #{custName}, password = #{password}, cust_phone = #{custPhone}, address = #{address}, header_pic = #{headerPic} where cust_id = #{custId}
mapper.select: select * from customer where cust_phone = #{custPhone} and password = #{password}
